column5: I warped both primary clutch sheaves and siezed my drive chain...you gotta change the oil in the gear case once in a while.
well.... thats a givin, hahaha. lucky for me i dont have to worry about chain case oil right now  just a barring
Getting lazy nowdays are we Dara?

I never realized that I should be changing gear case oil. The book said I should but I didn't realize it breaks down like that. I guess you could call it lazy. Blowing the idler bearings on the trail was because I was too lazy to loosen the track to check them in my shop this fall. I likely would have caught it then. The clutch was from over heating it..too fast for too long. I have been blowing belts and working towards the solution.  Live and learn...9,000 miles on it...gotta expect a bit to wear out. Its for sale next year if you know anybody interested
hmm... how much? i think my buddy is lookin for another yammie!

i wasn't fishing today until 11am.  hehe we did ok. nothing huge.  7 fish all between 1lb and 1-1/2.  fun to see all those little squirts down there chasing my lure on the flasher though. i also managed to jig up two epic suckers. lol. we took off around 2pm to ride around the hills for a bit then went home.

haha right on dr.sal! my buddies got some nice 2.5lb lakers, have to fight off the squirts! what are you using in there?? i jig a plain spoon and i dont even brother putting a still line, ive yet to see a fish come out there on a still.
theres suckers in there too?
Nice brookies. Bravo.    I gotta find some brookies spots here in Ontario. Only used to fishin for 'em in New Brunswick.
thanks stern rules, countless speck lakes in my neck of the woods!
yeah i didn't put a still in at all. spoons and tubes.  what a zoo out there today.
i jig a small #30 williams wabler just about 5ft below the ice, just keep it moving and they just hammmmmer it, no bait needed! same with the specks to!

got up bright and early and was out in goulais for 7am. gassed up the sleds and we were off!! at the lake by about 8am. first caught 8 lakers between my buddy and i. we had our limit so we went off in search of of some speckies! i pulled up 3 specks in no time. had my limit in lakers and specks by 9:15am hahaha!!! went riding around on the sleds then stopped where 3 of my buddies were fishing and they all nailed lakers like crazy. all fish were caught including specks on a #30 williams wabler in rainbow trout colour jigged about 5ft below the ice in around 15-20fow. was a great day out on the lake!!
yummm............... I GOTTA GET THAT AUGER!! hahaha.
Holy Smokes, great job dude. Was out today and only managed a handful of Perch  Looks like you had a blast though!  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
lake trout limit is 2 fish
i know terry and slot size. the other 2 are my buddies.
Nice trout dude! maybe the early bird does get the worm?   TDunn
your post says caught 8 lakers between you and a buddy. just thought i'd let you know that's more than your limit. and it's not a slot size. only 1 fish greater than 15.7inches

ya 8 were caught and 4 were tossed back down the hole, nice and healthy good to be caught another day tdunn my buddies were nailing lakers all morning and early afternoon till they left with their limit in nice sized lakers, but they didnt go for specks!
He and his buddy kept 2 each.  That is 4.  They kept their limit.  Nice catching worm dangler
yeah i get it. but it didn't say they let them go and the limit was 4 last year. and i see 4 in the picture. just pointing it out that's all
POACHER YOU POACHER GET OUT OF HERRE!!!!!
what trevy for keeping 4 last year when the limit was 3???
i only keep about a dozen fish all year and they're all walleyes. i just assumed the limit was 4 last year because that's what you claimed you kept.
Great catch WD. Thanks for sharing.
i think you should give the report a more thorough read.....

Awesome WD     Got to love it to limit out early morning like that To answer your question in the other thread.... yes I always do better when I get out before sunrise Great job on those trouts and thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice catch WD...I love how you get ragged on for not telling the whole story...assumptions are always fun
hey, im raggin on trevy here
sorry...I'm in a yappy mood
It is in fact pretty fun to rag on Gavin....
had to ride home on the back of another crazy persons sled today? lol
No he's just old, most old people are generally p!ssed off at one thing or the other   .  kidding dara
ooo boy!! how do my topics always get out of hand?!?! haha easy on the razzin!!
no...my sled is in the shop waiting for parts     Old?...c'mon and ride with me and I'll show you old
what'd ya break now dara? more or less parts than i did yesterday? hahaha.
